page.description: Returns a CR-LF delimited list of indices of array elements that match a filter.
page.original:
&ltARRAY>.MATCHING() Syntax Element_List as C = &ltARRAY>.MATCHING( Filter as C ) ArgumentDescription Element_ListA CR-LF delimited list of array elements matching Filter. FilterA character filter expression that selects elements in an array.
Description The &ltARRAY>.MATCHING() methods returns a CR-LF delimited list of elements from a single dimensional array that match a filter. Example dim p[10] as P p[1].fname="Selwyn" p[1].lname="Rabins" p[2].fname="Lenny" p[2].lname="Forziati" p[3].fname="Cian" p[3].lname="Chambliss" p[4].fname="Richard" p[4].lname="Rabins" ? p.matching("lname=\"Rabins\"") = [1] [4]
Note : The output includes the square brackets around each index See Also Array Functions and Methods
